item.title: HTML5 'formaction' attribute - An easy Modernizr test
item.description: EDIT NOTE: This no longer needs to be done outside of Modernizr. This was added to the Modernizr package about a month ago. Link to issue I’ve been writing some Html Forms, and in playing with submit buttons came across an interesting attribute in the HTML 5 specs: formaction. The definition, from HTML Living Standard Doc The action and formaction content attributes, if specified, must have a value that is a valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces.
